potionwarning.title: Potion Warning Config
potionwarning.option.warn-time: Choose when you get warned (in ticks)
potionwarning.option.textScale.tooltip: Change the size of the text in %
potionwarning.option.textPosX.tooltip: Change the text position around the x axis
potionwarning.option.textPosY.tooltip: Change the text position around the y axis
potionwarning.option.centeredText.toolti: Make the text centered around its position
